name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles GILMORE, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles GILMORE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed. See Commonwealth v. Story, 476 Pa. 391, 383 A.2d 155 (1978) (harmless error).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Burton A. Rose, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Paul S. Diamond, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
456 A.2d 148
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles GILMORE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 24, 1983.
Decided Feb. 9, 1983.
Burton A. Rose, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Paul S. Diamond, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
